name: Cursed Sight
description:
Being able to control fate would be a blessing for many. To Miyon, it is her greatest curse.
East and West Taria are in conflict, and Miyon's power will be the most valuable weapon.
Meanwhile, Gai has been sold by his family into Miyon's temple. Will the two save or destroy one another?

Cursed Sight is a visual novel about people's struggle against fate. The ~45,000 word story features four endings that are unlocked based on the player's choices. A demo version of the game is available so please feel free to give that a read first.

Thank you! I hope you will find the experience valuable.

Created by: InvertMouse
Artist: Tooaya
UI: Karla Featherstone
Composer: Efe Tozan
Programming: Kyle Tyner
